name: Chic Badger: Blue Cape
description: A creature with an endearingly dorky appearance. It has two streaks of long blue fur running down its shoulders like a cape.\nChic Badgers are born hunters, gifted with astonishing sprint power. Despite relocating to the Realm Within and freed from the worries of food scarcity, it remains ever-vigilant, anointing all stored provisions with pungent gland secretions. The odor proves so overwhelmingly potent that no animal loiters around the badger's den out of its own will...\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
